backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two filtering/sorting features, their related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files including filters, stats, hooks, map view, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark OKLCH color variables and applying base background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry loading Leaflet assets and mounting the React app with updated title and favicon links.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component wrapping the dashboard in a ThemeProvider with dark mode enabled.
frontend/src/components/earthquake/Dashb: Displays total events, above-threshold count, and largest-magnitude earthquake using stat cards.
frontend/src/components/earthquake/Earth: Modal dialog showing detailed earthquake info including magnitude, coordinates, depth, time, and MMI scale.
Leaflet-based map view that renders only earthquakes within current bounds and updates markers on map movement.
Displays a virtualized, scrollable table of earthquake events with selectable rows and action controls.
frontend/src/components/earthquake/FeedA: Provides UI controls for time window, magnitude, search input, and refresh to filter earthquake data.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, storage, and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module indicating USGS data fetching occurs elsewhere.
frontend/src/hooks/useUsgsEarthquakes.ts: Fetches USGS earthquake feed data using react-query with periodic refetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useVirtualWindow.ts: Implements lightweight list virtualization based on scroll position and estimated item height.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark themes, earth-tone variables, and Leaflet z-index fixes.
frontend/src/lib/earthquakeFilters.ts: Provides filtering and sorting utilities for earthquakes by time window, magnitude, and location query.
frontend/src/lib/earthquakeMapBounds.ts: Filters earthquakes to those within map bounds, handling padding and date-line wrapping.
frontend/src/lib/earthquakeStats.ts: Computes simple earthquake statistics including total count, threshold count, and largest magnitude event.
frontend/src/lib/fetchJson.ts: Provides a generic helper to fetch JSON from a URL and throw on HTTP errors.
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Contains utility functions for formatting timestamps, magnitudes, depths, and coordinates for display.
frontend/src/lib/leafletTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript bindings for Leaflet objects and includes helpers for checking Leaflet availability and creating earthquake markers.
frontend/src/lib/mmi.ts: Implements utilities for converting MMI values into formatted strings, Roman numerals, and descriptive labels.
frontend/src/lib/usgsFeeds.ts: Builds USGS feed URLs and provides magnitude classification and color helpers.
frontend/src/lib/usgsTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for USGS GeoJSON responses and earthquake filter options.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/EarthquakeDashboard.t: Implements the main earthquake dashboard with feed selection, filtering, stats, table/map views, and detail dialogs.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, typography, animations, and content paths.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented feature requirements.
